name: Signal - Train Ride
description:
This is a bit of a cheat as it is based on an old prototype I had kicking about. I abandoned it a while ago but I'm planning to fire it up again. I reworked a small element of the game so that it works as a screensaver, so I think it's in the spirit of the jam :)

It might run terribly, I have done literally nothing to optimise the thing!
